yacx

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • yacx.JNIHandle
      • yacx.Device

  • public class Device
extends JNIHandle
    Class to handle a CUDA-capable device.

      Memory available on device for __constant__ variables in a CUDA C kernel in bytes.
